title: Cashier URL (response)
description: Cashier URL for the specified type.

cashier.title: cashier
cashier.description:
Cashier URL.
**Note:** possible error codes are:
- `ASK_TNC_APPROVAL`: API call `tnc_approval`
- `ASK_AUTHENTICATE`
- `ASK_UK_FUNDS_PROTECTION`: API call `tnc_approval`
- `ASK_CURRENCY`: API call `set_account_currency`
- `ASK_EMAIL_VERIFY`: API call `verify_email`
- `ASK_FIX_DETAILS`: API call `set_settings`

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
